summary: BOUGHT CAR BRAND NEW.  DRIVERS SIDE MIRROR CONSISTENTLY VIBRATES - HAD REPLACED TWICE - DEALER WOULD NOT REPLACE A THIRD TIME DUE TO BUG SHIELD BEING INSTALLED.  IT STILL VIBRATES.   JUNE 2001 - DOOR LOCKS WENT NUTS.  THEY WOULD LOCK AND UNLOCK THEMSELVES WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD OR WHILE PARKED - WITH KEYS IN IT.  MARCH 2003 - BLINKER SWITCH WENT CRAZY.  IT WOULD NOT STOP CLICKING - WHOLE DASH HAD TO BE TAKEN OUT TO REPLACE SWITCH - NOT A CHEAP THING!  MAY 2003 - ALTERNATOR WENT OUT AND RUINED BATTERY.  ALMOST CAUSED A CAR FIRE.    TRANSMISSION FLUID LEAK.  NOT YET FIXED BECAUSE OF UNKNOWN CAUSE OF PROBLEM.  *NLM
